title: Pandas Categorical columns are not compatible
body:
Running this code,

```
train.loc[:, cat_feats] = train.loc[:, cat_feats].astype('categorical')
dataset = lgb.Dataset(train.loc[:, X_cols], label=train.target)
lgb_model = lgb.train({}, dataset, num_boost_round=int(1.1 * len(eval_hist['auc-mean']))) 
## note categorical_feature='auto' by default
#  uses categorical type columns as set above.

explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(lgb_model)
shap_values = explainer.shap_values(train)
```

I get this error,

```
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-17-22d843dbc1f3> in <module>()
      1 explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(lgb_train)
----> 2 shap_values = explainer.shap_values(train)

~/miniconda3/envs/home-service/lib/python3.6/site-packages/shap/explainers/tree.py in shap_values(self, X, tree_limit, **kwargs)
    133             phi = self.trees.predict(X, ntree_limit=tree_limit, pred_contribs=True)
    134         elif self.model_type == "lightgbm":
--> 135             phi = self.model.predict(X, num_iteration=tree_limit, pred_contrib=True)
    136             if phi.shape[1] != X.shape[1] + 1:
    137                 phi = phi.reshape(X.shape[0], phi.shape[1]//(X.shape[1]+1), X.shape[1]+1)

~/miniconda3/envs/home-service/lib/python3.6/site-packages/lightgbm/basic.py in predict(self, data, num_iteration, raw_score, pred_leaf, pred_contrib, data_has_header, is_reshape, pred_parameter, **kwargs)
   1800         if num_iteration <= 0:
   1801             num_iteration = self.best_iteration
-> 1802         return predictor.predict(data, num_iteration, raw_score, pred_leaf, pred_contrib, data_has_header, is_reshape)
   1803 
   1804     def get_leaf_output(self, tree_id, leaf_id):

~/miniconda3/envs/home-service/lib/python3.6/site-packages/lightgbm/basic.py in predict(self, data, num_iteration, raw_score, pred_leaf, pred_contrib, data_has_header, is_reshape)
    404         if isinstance(data, Dataset):
    405             raise TypeError("Cannot use Dataset instance for prediction, please use raw data instead")
--> 406         data = _data_from_pandas(data, None, None, self.pandas_categorical)[0]
    407         predict_type = C_API_PREDICT_NORMAL
    408         if raw_score:

~/miniconda3/envs/home-service/lib/python3.6/site-packages/lightgbm/basic.py in _data_from_pandas(data, feature_name, categorical_feature, pandas_categorical)
    271 
    272             msg = """DataFrame.dtypes for data must be int, float or bool. Did not expect the data types in fields """
--> 273             raise ValueError(msg + ', '.join(bad_fields))
    274         data = data.values.astype('float')
    275     else:

ValueError: DataFrame.dtypes for data must be int, float or bool. Did not expect the data types in fields CAT_1, CAT_2
```

I have updated my lightgbm and shap packages to the most recent on pip as I saw you made some changes in https://github.com/slundberg/shap/issues/176 and https://github.com/slundberg/shap/issues/170. These updates did not help.

What did work was adding the following `categorical_feature=cat_feat` kwarg to `lgb_model`, and these lines of code before,
```
ord_enc = ce.OrdinalEncoder(cols=cat_feats)
train = ord_enc.fit_transform(train)
```
